name: sentence-cipher
description: A Go/Node.js library that encodes data into natural-looking English sentences for steganography.

scripts.build: pnpm --filter exports build && pnpm --filter playground build
scripts.release: pnpm bumpp --execute "node scripts/update-version.js && pnpm --filter exports build && git add cipher.go packages/exports/lib.js packages/exports/lib.js.map packages/exports/lib.d.ts" && pnpm publish --no-git-checks --access public
